pullRequest.title: Spring storage remove resource manager provider
pullRequest.bodyText:
Take over the PR #15837.
This PR is going to

Add a Spring extension of the azure-identity library
Upgrade the resource manager dependencies to track2
Break down the whole resourcemanager provider into separate resource providers for each service.

commit.message: Modify README.md files and unit tests (#2)

nodes.bodyText: the code you have marked as comment here, I am not sure whether it's appropriate, should we delete?
Need to set one environment here?

If alternativePrefix is not null, then we will get managed identity credential if there is no such prefixed configuration in Environment. The order should be:

Check alternativePrefix client-id, client-secret
Check alternativePrefix client-id, client-certificate-path
If there is only alternativePrefix client-id, try managed identity with client-id
Check default prefix client-id, client-secret
Check default prefix client-id, client-certificate-path
If there is only default prefix client-id, try managed identity with client-id
Use managed identity with no argument

commit.message:
Storage identity remove resource manager provider (#3)

Update README files to make the description more accurate.
Throw an exception when configuration is incomplete
Changing the Identity Helper into a builder
Adding storage resource sample, autoconfiguration for blob storage with default identity
Attempting to generate an endpoint string
Provisional workaround for using IdentityToken in Shared service connections
Throw an exception when configuration is incomplete
Changing the Identity Helper into a builder
Adding storage resource sample, autoconfiguration for blob storage with default identity
Attempting to generate an endpoint string
Provisional workaround for using IdentityToken in Shared service connections
Merge branch 'storage-identity' of github.com:yevster/azure-sdk-for-java into storage-identity
Removing tight Resource Manager Provider coupling

Merge branch 'master' into storage-identity-remove-resource-manager-provider

Merging from master.
Fixing autoconfiguration for legacy resource management to not kick in and break when attmepting to use 2.0 version of resource management
Resource demo works with file legacy file credentail'
Resource sample works with environment parameters
Fixing SPEL expression to omit legacy auto-config when using Spring environment
Adding mock token credentail to Actuator test config to ward off unearned failure
Adding mock token credentail to Actuator test config to ward off unearned failure
Removing topic manager dependency from queue autoconfig
Fixing autoconfig dependencies for Topic binders

Fixing startup failure when namespace is provided instead of connection
string.
Updating to incorporate upstream library signature changes
include version tag should be on the same line
Spring Cloud Stream - Event Hub binder demo now works

Preventing reliance on resource management bean when resource group
parameter not set (i.e. that bean would not be initialized)
Fixing package names broken in merge
Eliminating ServiceBus ARM dependency when not pulled in thorugh settings
Removing module for superfluous storage resource demeo
Fixing parent pom of identity library
use resourcmanager version from master branch
we should use 2.0.0 version for resourcemanager
fix unit tests error, to avoid using System properties, in case there will be concurrent issue
enrich unit test cases for spring-cloud-autoconfigure
run service bus multiple binders sample with connection string and service principal
